name: Introduction to Neuroscience
description: This course provides an introduction and overview of the structure and function of the nervous system.

name: Cellular Neuroscience
description: This course covers the structure and function of neurons at the cellular level, including ion channels, synaptic transmission, excitability, and plasticity.

name: Neural Systems and Behavior
description: This course covers the principles of neural system structure and function as they relate to behavior.

name: Computational Neuroscience I
description: This course covers the basics of computational neuroscience, such as neural networks, cellular automata, and the Hodgkin-Huxley equations.

name: Computational Neuroscience II
description: This course covers more advanced topics in computational neuroscience, such as spiking neural networks and reinforcement learning.
